entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.summary: A LIFETIME OF CREATIVITY Since the beginning of my career, I’ve focused on channeling my talent and creativity into meaningful and powerful results. I take pride in the work I do, as well as the strong relationships I’ve built with clients and colleagues. I firmly…
entry.content:
A LIFETIME OF CREATIVITY

Since the beginning of my career, I’ve focused on channeling my talent and creativity into meaningful and powerful results. I take pride in the work I do, as well as the strong relationships I’ve built with clients and colleagues. I firmly believe in working hard, working together, and having fun along the way. If you’re interested in learning more about me or my work, simply reach out.

 

SELECTED CLIENTS

 

EXPERIENCE

 
Graphic Designer
BONGBONG Clinic Co., Ltd. · Full-time
2016 - Present · 6 yrs 11 months
Bangkok City, ThailandBangkok City, Thailand
  • Responsible for content marketing planning and content writing, including publishing via various online channels
  • Design digital and print media for marketing communications.
  • Script writing and filming interviews with clinic clients.
  • Create animation and video editing for marketing communications.

Graphic Designer
Ekaluck Interprint Co., Ltd.· Full-time

Jan 2014 - Jan 2016 · 2 yrs 1 month
20,22 Soi 32 Samakkhee Rd. Nonthaburi 11000.
  • Responsible for designing print media and publishing with writers such as billboards, flyers, leaflets, posters, books, magazines, and annual reports, etc.
  • Arrange artwork for offset printing including color separation for printing and special printing techniques such as embossing, coating, etc.

Graphic Designer
Baanpoonam Group Co., Ltd. · Full-time

May 2012 - Jan 2014 · 1 yr 9 months
75/79 Soi Rom Klao 1, Rom Klao Rd. Minburi, Bangkok 10510
  • Responsible for designing print media and publishing with writers such as billboards, flyer, leaflets, posters, books, magazines, annual reports, etc.
